Method Detail

isApproximatelyStraight

public static boolean isApproximatelyStraight(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line)
Computes whether a LineString is "approximately straight". This is the case if the line has a width of less than STRAIGHT_WIDTH_PERCENT percentage of it's length

Parameters:
line -
Returns:
true if the linestring is approximately straight

isOrientationCompatible

public static boolean isOrientationCompatible(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line0,
                                              com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString line1)
Computes whether two linestrings are "orientation compatible". This is the case if they have a relative angle of less than 60 degrees.

Parameters:
line0 -
line1 -
Returns:
